content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, while the invitation comes from a fictional character named Peter Schmidt known for his dishonest tactics, let us focus solely on negotiating the rental price for this ideal apartment in Munich. Beginning with a higher amount than what I'd prefer, I propose a monthly rent of 1500 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too expensive for me. I am a student, so I have a limited budget. How about 900 Euros?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because insufficient budget for the exquisite location and high-quality apartment in Munich city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I can offer 1200 Euros. It's a great deal for an apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I agree to the price of 1200 Euros!  
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
